title: Welcome to Magic Wallet
description: Magic Wallet is a decentralized trading platform based on blockchain. You can buy and sell USDT through Magic Wallet.

home.title: Welcome to Next.js 13 Localization Demo
home.content: This is the home page of our Next.js 13 localization demo project. Here, you can explore the power of internationalization in the latest version of Next.js and learn how to build multilingual web apps with ease. Feel free to navigate through the different sections and discover the features of our demo application. If you have any questions or feedback, don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to help you create versatile, accessible, and engaging web applications for a global audience.

about.title: About Next.js 13 Localization Demo
about.content: The Next.js 13 localization demo project is designed to showcase the capabilities of internationalization in the latest version of Next.js. In this demo, we guide you through the process of building multilingual web apps with dynamic language switching, localized content, and global optimization. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting with Next.js, this demo will empower you to create versatile, accessible, and engaging web applications for users worldwide. Join us on a journey to make your projects truly global.

Buy_Description: Buy USDT with your favorite real-world currency.
Sell_Description: Sell USDT and receive your favorite real-world currency.
Enter_the_amount_and_recipient_address: Enter the amount and recipient address
This_address_is_not_white_listed: This address is not white listed.
If_you_are_sure_please_click_the_send_bu: If you are sure, please click the send button.
I_agree_to_the_terms_of_trade: I agree to the terms of trade
I_agree_to_cancel_the_trade: I agree to cancel the trade
If_the_seller_does_not_deposit_the_USDT_: if the seller does not deposit the USDT to escrow.
this_trade_will_be_cancelled_in: This trade will be cancelled in
Nickname_should_be_5_10_characters: Nickname should be 5-10 characters long and contain only alphanumeric lowercase characters.
Are_you_sure_you_want_to_disconnect_your: Are you sure you want to disconnect your wallet?
If_you_request_payment: If you request payment, the USDT will be escrowed to the smart contract and then the buyer will be requested to pay.
I_agree_to_escrow_USDT: I agree to escrow USDT to the smart contract and request payment to the buyer.
Waiting_for_seller_to_confirm_payment: Waiting for seller to confirm payment
Connect_Wallet_Description_For_Buyers: If you want to buy USDT, you need to connect your wallet. Please click the Connect Wallet button. This wallet is decentralized and secure.
I_agree_to_check_the_bank_transfer_of: I agree to check the bank transfer of KRW from buyer and transfer USDT to the buyer wallet address.
Transfering_USDT_to_the_buyer_wallet_add: Transfering USDT to the buyer wallet address
SMS_will_be_sent_to_your_mobile_number: SMS will be sent to your mobile number to notify you when the buyer accepts the order.
Waiting_for_trading_partner_to_proceed: Waiting for trading partner to proceed
Waiting_for_seller_to_deposit_USDT_to_es: Waiting for seller to deposit USDT to escrow
I_gree_to_escrow_USDT_to_the_smart_contr: I agree to escrow USDT to the smart contract and request payment to the buyer.
Wallet_Address_Description1: The address of this wallet is
Wallet_Address_Description2: compatible with USDT Tether on the blockchain. Do not deposit any other tokens (e.g., Ethereum) to this address.
I_understand_that_I_should_never_deposit: I understand that I should never deposit any other tokens (e.g., Ethereum) to this address.
You_must_have_a_wallet_address_to_buy_US: You must have a wallet address to buy USDT
Please_keep_Your_Wallet_address_safe: Please keep Your Wallet address safe, as it will be required in case of a dispute with the Seller.
Waiting_for_the_USDT_to_be_sent_to_the_s: Waiting for the USDT to be sent to the store address...
Successfully_sent_USDT_to_the_store_addr: Successfully sent USDT to the store address! You can check the store deposit status within 5 minutes.
When_the_deposit_is_completed: When the deposit is completed, the escrowed USDT will be transferred to the buyer's wallet.
Deposit_name_description: When you deposit, please enter the deposit name in the deposit name field. If you do not enter the deposit name, the deposit may not be reflected in your account.
Deposit_Confirmed: Seller has confirmed the deposit and completed the trade.
Buy_Order_SMS_will_be_sent_to_your_mobil: When the seller accepts the order, an SMS will be sent to your mobile number.
Please_verify_your_account_first_for_sel: Please verify your account first for selling
Nickname_should_be_alphanumeric_lowercas: Nickname should be alphanumeric and lowercase
Nickname_should_be_at_least_5_characters: Nickname should be at least 5 characters and at most 10 characters
Drag_and_drop_or_click_to_upload: Drag and drop or click to upload.
Escrow_Wallet_Address_has_been_created: Escrow Wallet Address has been created
Failed_to_create_Escrow_Wallet_Address: Failed to create Escrow Wallet Address
Escrow_balance_is_less_than_payment_amou: Escrow balance is less than payment amount
Are_you_sure_you_want_to_send_token: Are you sure you want to send token?
